      MyPanel(int width, int height, int[][][] boardSpaceData, int numRows, int numColumns)
      MyPanel constructor 1, this constructor is used by the drawBoard method, does not have information about players or spaces Some custom Colours are defined.
      MyPanel(int width, int height, int[][][] boardSpaceData, int numRows, int numColumns, java.util.ArrayList<Player> players, java.util.ArrayList<Space> spaces)
      MyPanel constructor 2, this constructor is used by the redrawBoard method, takes in information on the players and spaces.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MyPanel

        public MyPanel(int width,
               int height,
               int[][][] boardSpaceData,
               int numRows,
               int numColumns)
        MyPanel constructor 1, this constructor is used by the drawBoard method, does not have information about players or spaces Some custom Colours are defined.
        Parameters:
        width - Width of a space
        height - Height of a space
        boardSpaceData - Board Space data is a 3 dimensional int array (int[][][]) that contains all of the space data (space num, space type and branch num).
        numRows - number of Rows of spaces
        numColumns - number of Columns of Spaces

      • MyPanel

        public MyPanel(int width,
               int height,
               int[][][] boardSpaceData,
               int numRows,
               int numColumns,
               java.util.ArrayList<Player> players,
               java.util.ArrayList<Space> spaces)
        MyPanel constructor 2, this constructor is used by the redrawBoard method, takes in information on the players and spaces. Some custom colours are defined.
        Parameters:
        width - Width of a space
        height - Height of a space
        boardSpaceData - Board Space data is a 3 dimensional int array (int[][][]) that contains all of the space data (space num, space type and branch num).
        numRows - number of Rows of spaces
        numColumns - number of Columns of Spaces
        players - List of Player objects
        spaces - List of Space objects

    • Method Detail

      • paintComponent

        public void paintComponent(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Overrides:
        paintComponent in class javax.swing.JComponent

      • drawBoardSpaces

        public void drawBoardSpaces(java.awt.Graphics g)
        drawBoardSpaces draws the board defined by the information in boardSpaceData. Paints a rectangle for all spaces in boardSpaceData. Colour of the rectangle is selected based on the second element in BoardSpaceData, which is the space type (eg. Stop Spaces are Red, Payday Spaces are green.) Writes the name of the spacetype on the rectangle, also based on the second element of BoardSpaceData. Retirement Space is drawn larger than other spaces.
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics object

      • drawPawnPositions

        public void drawPawnPositions(java.awt.Graphics g)
        drawPawnPositions draws oval's for each players pawn, based on the pawn colour they selected at the beginning of the game. Pawn's are slightly offset in the x axis to allow multiple pawns to be displayed on the one space.
        Parameters:
        g - Graphic object

      • drawPawnLegend

        public void drawPawnLegend(java.awt.Graphics g)
        drawPawnLegend() paints a legend in the top right corner of the board, with the name and pawn colour of every player
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics Object

      • intToSpaceType

        public java.lang.String intToSpaceType(int spaceTypeNum)
        intToSpaceType() converts the int index of a space type (1-16) into a string describing that space type. Used in drawBoardSpaces.
        Parameters:
        spaceTypeNum - Int index of SpaceType
        Returns:
        Returns a string of the space Type
